SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.integrations

Class Integration<T>

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.integrations.Integration<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of integration result (e.g., PlaceholderEngine for PlaceholderAPI)
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlaceholderApiIntegration
public abstract class Integration<T> extends Object
Abstract class for all integrations with external plugins Provides basic logic for availability checking and initialization
